subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Antonio Margarito stopped Miguel Cotto in the 11th round with two knockdowns Saturday night, capping a dramatic bout at the MGM Grand Garden in Las Vegas. He claimed the World Boxing Association 147-pound title.
snippet: Antonio Margarito stopped Miguel Cotto in the 11th round with two knockdowns Saturday night, capping a dramatic bout at the MGM Grand Garden in Las Vegas. He claimed the World Boxing Association 147-pound title.
